WorkItem.Description:
Hi. I'm working on the music store app in vs 2012 mvc4. So i have problem after creating the admin user i.e after adding the notation   [Authorize(Roles = "Administrator")].

After adding this notation i can't open the log in view.

I've tried adding the  <add key="enableSimpleMembership" value ="false" /> in webconfig inside <app setting> but this not help me.

Please someone help me.
